  Firestorm: 
  ok,=

  shields d=
own, because you controlled the guns of the Iron Fist 
  which is illegal. =
As I think that Alloran already said (and probably 
  me) read, read, re-re=
ad the rule, until you know them front to 
  backwards.

  This rpg may be =
freeform, but we placed in structural forces to 
  keep the rpg fun for eve=
ryone who plays in it. It is too easy to fall 
  into an arms race in this =
type of rpg. Have you been to the rpg's 
  web page yet? That's where you'l=
l find the rules, and all other 
  information you may need... welllll, may=
be not all of the information 
  that you need, but you can email any of th=
e council members 
  about questions that you may have.

  Soulstice:
  If =
you don't like thecode@... so much, then why don't you 
  get anoth=
er?
